short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks your online posts from bots, AI, and OCR readers.  Hide your online messages from the man!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A completely local service for obfuscating your messages for social media to avoid them being read by screen readers, OCR (optical character recognition), AI, or other bots.  Post safely knowing your messages won't be read and taken out of context.  Think of it as backwards CAPTCHA.
